Package angryflappybird

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • angryflappybird.Sprite
  • public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the properties and methods of each character of the game.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Sprite()
      Creates invisible sprite with no velocity, located on bottom left corner of the scene.
      Sprite​(double pX, double pY, javafx.scene.image.Image image)
      Creates a sprite that is displayed as the image, located at the given position.

      • Sprite

        Creates invisible sprite with no velocity, located on bottom left corner of the scene.

      • Sprite

        public Sprite​(double pX,
              double pY,
              javafx.scene.image.Image image)
        Creates a sprite that is displayed as the image, located at the given position.
        Parameters:
        pX - X-coord of (corner of) Sprite location
        pY - Y-coord of (corner of) Sprite location
        image - to display for the Sprite

        public void addVelocity​(double x,

        Parameters:
        x - value to be added to x-component speed
        y - value to be added to y-component speed
